oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LOW-MOBILITY TRANSPORT OF COARSE-GRAINED BED MATERIAL
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: van den Bos, Jeroen
Verhagen, Henk Jan
Olthof, Jelle
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bed protections
transport
wave-current interaction
turbulence modeling
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Paintal (1967) formula can be used to estimate transport rates of coarse-grained bed material (such as stones from a bed protection) under low hydraulic loads just above the threshold of motion; the application however is limited to steady currents. This paper presents research aimed at extending the range of application to a combination of regular non-breaking waves and a steady current.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 32 (2010): Proceedings of 32nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Shanghai, China, 2010.; sediment.13
